title: Grand Opening Eco-Lodge Escape in Tadoba National Park with All-Inclusive Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner
description:
Head into the wilderness of Tadoba, where tigers and leopards roam free, with a stay at the brand-new Waghoba Eco Lodge set in the buffer zone of Maharashtra's oldest national park.

This 12-acre jungle paradise of an untraversed area in the buffer zone of Tadoba National Park is brimming with opportunities for adventure and excitement. Conscious about your footprint on the environment? You needn't worry as every corner of this eco-lodge beams with environmentally friendly and sustainable practices including the design, with each cottage built using handmade bricks and local stone. Less than three hours from Nagpur, nine hours from Hyderabad and 18 hours from Mumbai, Waghoba Eco Lodge can easily become your go-to wildlife destination since it's located within a half-hourâ€™s drive of the national park's Khutwanda and Moharli gates.
offer_address: Talu Bhadrawati, Village - Wadala Tukum, Post Office - Astha, Tadoba, Maharashtra 442906
